title: Old diaries, 1881-1901 /
author: Gower, Ronald Sutherland
snippet: Minehost introduced me to his new son-in-law, young " Monty "Erskine, who married a year or two ago Miss FlorenceFlower— a very pleasing, handsome fellow. The two Flowersons, Archie and Fordham, and three daughters were theparty, Mrs Edgar being away at Millhill. _Shakespeare's Day followed.
